scripts.clean: find dist/app -name '*.ts' -delete && find dist/app -name '*.js.map' -delete && find dist/ -name 'tsconfig.json' -delete && find dist/ -name 'package.json' -delete && find dist/ -name '.gitignore' -delete && find dist/ -name 'typings.json' -delete && rm -R dist/typings
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run clean
